    • Constructor Detail

      • OfficeManagerImpl

        public OfficeManagerImpl​(long monitorInterval,
                         MonitorClockImpl monitorClock,
                         FunctionLoop functionLoop,
                         java.util.Timer timer)
        Initiate.
        Parameters:
        monitorInterval - Interval in milliseconds between each check of the Office. Setting this high reduces overhead of managing the Office, however setting lower increases responsiveness of the Office.
        monitorClock - MonitorClock for the Office.
        functionLoop - FunctionLoop for the Office.
        timer - Timer to monitor the Office.
